meanings: (쓰레기 등을) throw away, throw out, dump, (informal) junk
(포기하다, 떠나다) desert, leave, abandon, (literary) forsake, give up

vlive.korean: "앗... 너무 벅차버렸나?" "Ah... Was it too much"? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : [FULL] ATEEZ(에이티즈) ONLINE ATINY PARTY [Crescent]

examples.korean: Aren't we forgeting the true meaning of Christmas? You know... the birth of Santa. (Matt Groening) 발음듣기 크리스마스의 진정한 의미를 잊어버렸나요? 그건 말이죠... 산타의 생일이죠.(만화 '심슨 가족'의 엉뚱한 대사) (매트 그로닝, 계절명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Aren't we forgeting the true meaning of Christmas? You know... the birth of Santa. (Matt Groening) 발음

examples.korean: Maybe the zoo-keeper forgot to lock the door. 발음듣기 아마 동물원 사육사가 문을 잠그는 것을 잊어 버렸나 봐요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Maybe the zoo-keeper forgot to lock the door. 발음

examples.korean: The waitress seems to have forgotten about bringing us some wet towels. 발음듣기 여종업원이 물수건을 갖다주는 것을 잊어버렸나 봐. Neungyule
examples.english: The waitress seems to have forgotten about bringing us some wet towels. 발음

examples.korean: I must have forgot to input the order. 발음듣기 내가 주문 입력하는 걸 잊어버렸나 봐요. Neungyule
examples.english: I must have forgot to input the order. 발음

examples.korean: I heard your dream was to be a professional golfer. Did you completely abandon that dream? 발음듣기 프로 골퍼가 원래 꿈이었다고 들었는데 완전히 그 꿈을 버렸나요? TIMES CORE
examples.english: I heard your dream was to be a professional golfer. Did you completely abandon that dream? 발음
